title: Room temperature storage of myrtle (Eugenia gracillima Kiaersk.) tropical juice: Effects of physical and chemical preservation methods
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Bruno Fonseca Feitosa, Leidiana Elias Xavier, Maria Silvanete Benedito de Sousa Lermen, Monica Correia Goncalves, Tiago Augusto Lima Cardoso, Joao Vitor Fonseca Feitoza, Adriano Sant'Ana Silva, Emanuel Neto Alves de Oliveira, Marcella Camargo Marques, Lilian Regina Barros Mariutti, Monica Tejo Cavalcanti
